parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the service is deployed.

parameters.name: ContainerName
parameters.description: The name of the container that runs the service.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: InstanceName
parameters.description: The name of the instance that runs the service. For more information about how to query the instance name, see [ListServiceInstances](~~412108~~).

parameters.name: Ip
parameters.description: The IP address of the instance whose logs you want to query. For more information about how to query the IP address of an instance, see [ListServiceInstances](~~412108~~).

parameters.name: Keyword
parameters.description: The keyword that you use to query the logs of the service.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 500.

parameters.name: Previous
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to query the logs that are generated before the instance last restarts. This parameter is available only if the instance restarts.

Valid values:

*   true

    <!-- -->

    <!-- -->

    <!-- -->

*   false

    <!-- -->

    <!-- -->

    <!-- -->

parameters.name: ServiceName
parameters.description: The service name. For more information about how to query the service name, see [ListServices](~~412109~~).

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. The time must be in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
